abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; Mingei International Museum in San Diego will exhibit antique cloth dolls from collection of Deborah J Neff; Karl E Meyer and Shareen Blair Brysac book The China Collectors: America’s Century-Long Hunt for Asian Art Treasures chronicles plundering of Asian antiquities.
lead_paragraph: An exhibition at the Mingei International Museum showcases African-American dolls made between 1850 and 1930, from the collection of Deborah Neff.

headline.main: A Love for Vintage Dolls That Never Grows Old
headline.print_headline: A Love for Vintage Dolls That Never Grows Old

snippet: An exhibition at the Mingei International Museum showcases African-American dolls made between 1850 and 1930, from the collection of Deborah Neff.
